newsitem.title: GREECE: IONIAN BANK OFFERS FOREX DEPOSIT ACCOUNTS.
newsitem.headline: IONIAN BANK OFFERS FOREX DEPOSIT ACCOUNTS.

text.p: Ionian Bank said on Wednesday that permanent residents as well as corporations domiciled in Greece may open deposit accounts in foreign currency after the recent lifting of controls by the Bank of Greece. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
